description: Fireball with Ginger Ale is ridiculously easy to make and gets you in the holiday spirit or gives you fall vibes. The sweet and spicy flavors of the whiskey are perfectly matched by the bubbly and also spicy ginger ale, making for a revitalizing and vibrant drink.Whether you're celebrating&nbsp;Christmas, Hanukkah, or&nbsp;New Year's Eve, this cocktail will surely add some cheer to your holiday festivities. Waste no time and concoct this drink already, and it might just become your new favorite&nbsp;holiday tradition.
keywords: Fireball With Ginger Ale Cocktail Recipe
How To Fireball With Ginger Ale
name: Fireball With Ginger Ale

recipeInstructions.name: Pour the Fireball and ginger ale into the glass and stir.

recipeInstructions.name: Drop a cherry into the drink or stick a lime wedge into the rim for garnish.
